Software developer

Viento Modeling, Simulation and Analysis, August 2024 - present
  • Led development of a plugin in C++ for agent-based operational modeling software
  • Designed supporting software, unit tests and integration tests in C++, C#, Javascript and Python
  • Containerized both simulation software and supporting software and managed deployments using Docker and k8s

Teaching assistant and grader

University of New Mexico, January 2021 - May 2024
  • Graded functional programming, numerical computing, discrete mathematics and introductory Java homeworks
  • Wrote software in Scheme and Haskell to auto-grade some homeworks and automate repetitive tasks
  • Held office hours and recitations to provide students with one-on-one help

Technical specialist

University of New Mexico, July 2023 - May 2024
  • Used R and glmnet package to manipulate large columnar datasets efficiently
  • Implemented modified elastic net regression algorithm for project by modifying skikit-learn Python package
  • Statistically analyzed CIC-IDS-2018 and other open-source network intrusion datasets

Counselor

PROMYS, July 2022 - August 2022
  • Met regularly with high-school students to give feedback on proof-writing and discuss topics in number theory
  • Designed mini-courses and seminars on special topics like formal logic, model theory and type theory

ASSURE research fellow

University of New Mexico, January 2022 - May 2022
  • Used numerical computation techniques to approximate fluid flow past surfaces
  • Wrote technical report and presented results at undergraduate research symposium

Research assistant

Hand and Machine Lab at University of New Mexico, July 2021 - August 2022
  • Developed ExtruderTurtle Python library to generate GCODE for 3D-printed solids using the Turtle paradigm
  • Presented findings at TEI 2022 conference and UNM Computational Fabrication seminar
